paper_title.en: Characteristics of heat transfer around a horizontal fine wire in a circulating fluidized bed

description.en:
Experimental study on the heat transfer mechanism from a horizontal fine platinum wire to particles was carried out in a riser of a circulating fluidized bed (CFB). As an experimental apparatus, the riser duct consisted of 33.7 mm squared cross sectional area and 1 620 mm in a height. The test section was installed at the suitable height (0.9 m) from a distributor. Both the particle diameters (dp) and the wire diameters (dw) were 100, 200 and 400 μm. As the results, it was found the significant relationship between the particle behavior and the characteristics of heat transfer around a horizontal fine wire in CFB was found. It was found out that the heat transfer coefficient for the case of dp &lt
 dw was larger than that for the case of dp &gt
 dw in the turbulent fluidization region. It was also found that there were some relationships between the gas velocity and the characteristics of the heat transfer around a horizontal fine wire in the dilute fluidization region.

paper_title.en: Study on the shape and behavior of the formed bubbles in a pressurized fluidized bed (simulation for the behavior of formed bubble from single nozzle)
paper_title.ja: 加圧流動層における生成気泡の形状及び挙動に関する研究(単一ノズルから発生する気泡挙動の数値シミュレーション)

description.en: By using numerical analysis in the present study, we found that the size of formed bubble increased with air-flow rate and pressure in a solid-gas pressurized fluidized bed. But frequency of production was almost kept a constant without changing pressure. Calculation were based on DEM code where have taken a new approach concerning the air void rate and accuracy of convergence. To verify the bubble behavior, the experimental observation on the shape and flow characteristics of the formed bubble was carried out in the distributor with a single nozzle in the pressurized solid-gas fluidized bed. Experimental data were obtained from the visualized image of the bubble using the shadow-graph method and later were analyzed. Those results indicate that the size and rising velocity of the bubble increased with added rate of nozzle flow and these bubble behaviors directly correspond to increase of pressure in the bed. Also the growth rate of first produced bubble was agreed with the previous works in theoretical and experimental.

paper_title.en: Study on the shape and flow characteristics of the formed bubbles in a pressurized fluidized bed (for the case of formed bubble from single nozzle)
paper_title.ja: 加圧流動層内生成気泡の形状とその流動に関する研究(単一ノズルから発生する気泡の場合)

description.en: It is most important factors that were dealt with the size and production frequency of formed bubble and the rising state of bubble in the distributor vicinity at a solid-gas fluidized bed for the mixing and reacting process of the fluidized bed. Especially it is more complicated in the case of the pressurized fluidized bed. In order to understand the mechanism and behavior of the formed bubble, the investigations on the shape and flow characteristics of the formed bubble in a pressurized bed was carried out and bubbles were formed at a single nozzle in the pressurized solid-gas fluidized bed with distributor. Experimental data were obtained from visualized image of the bubble using the shadow-graph method and were analyzed. Those results indicate that the size and rising velocity of bubble were increased with relation to increase of the nozzle flow rate and these bubble behavior were varied with increase of the pressure in bed.

paper_title.ja: 流動層内の水平円管周りの粒子挙動と熱伝達特性(粒子径の影響)
paper_title.en: The Effects of Particle Size on Particle Behavior and Heat Transfer around Horizontal Tube in a Fluidized Bed

description.ja: The effects of particle size on the particle behavior and heat transfer coefficient around a horizontal tube in a gas-solid fluidized bed were quantitatively investigated. Three kinds of glass beads with different average diameters (0.2, 0.42, and 1.0 mm) were used in this experiment. The local particle behavior and instantaneous heat transfer coefficient on the tube surface were simultaneously measured. Comparing the experimental results with the existed theoretical heat transfer model, the differences of the heat transfer mechanisms between the different particle sizes were made clear.
description.en: The effects of particle size on the particle behavior and heat transfer coefficient around a horizontal tube in a gas-solid fluidized bed were quantitatively investigated. Three kinds of glass beads with different average diameters (0.2, 0.42, and 1.0 mm) were used in this experiment. The local particle behavior and instantaneous heat transfer coefficient on the tube surface were simultaneously measured. Comparing the experimental results with the existed theoretical heat transfer model, the differences of the heat transfer mechanisms between the different particle sizes were made clear.

paper_title.en: High-speed Temperature Sensing in Microscopic Area (Relationship between Impulse Signal and Abrasive Grain Diameter with Temperature of Grinding Wheel Surface)

description.ja: A new type of infrared radiation thermometer with an optical fiber that has fast response time (3μs) and microscopic measurable area (φ110μm) was developed for thermal analysis of the grinding phenomenon. The obtained signals are made up of impulse signals and base signals. In order to elucidate why the impulse signals occur, we undertook some examinations. As a result, this impulse signal was found to correspond to the grain size. Its interval time seems to also correspond to the time between successive cutting points on the grinding wheel. The smaller the grain size is, the smaller is the heat production per grain. When the measurable area is larger than that targetted, the output signal indicates the shape of a plateau. On the other hand, when the measurable area is smaller than that targeted, the output signal indicates a chevron shape.
description.en: A new type of infrared radiation thermometer with an optical fiber that has fast response time (3μs) and microscopic measurable area (φ110μm) was developed for thermal analysis of the grinding phenomenon. The obtained signals are made up of impulse signals and base signals. In order to elucidate why the impulse signals occur, we undertook some examinations. As a result, this impulse signal was found to correspond to the grain size. Its interval time seems to also correspond to the time between successive cutting points on the grinding wheel. The smaller the grain size is, the smaller is the heat production per grain. When the measurable area is larger than that targetted, the output signal indicates the shape of a plateau. On the other hand, when the measurable area is smaller than that targeted, the output signal indicates a chevron shape.

work_title.ja: 全自動海苔乾燥システムの高効率化及びその評価
高含水有機物の省エネ型高効率乾燥システムの研究開発
PSA装置内の圧縮空気流動の解析および形状の最適化

description.ja:
継続研究として計画
１．水素吸蔵合金の吸蔵特性および熱物性に関する研究
２．燃料電池内の湿度管理を目的に計画された多年度課題テーマ（昨年度、今年度は乾湿度型の湿度センサー開発）
３．気泡流動層における難流動性粒子の流動特性に関する研究
４．研削加工時における水ミスト冷却が被加工物へ及ぼす効果に関する研究

継続研究として計画
１．水素吸蔵合金の吸蔵特性および熱物性に関する研究
２．多孔質体内における水平平板伝熱面上の熱及び物質移動に関する研究
３．気泡流動層における難流動性粒子の流動特性に関する研究
４．研削加工時における水ミスト冷却が被加工物へ及ぼす効果に関する研究

単年度研究として計画
５．病態体温に対応した冷却用熱交換器に関する研究
６．探針法による液膜厚さ測定に関する研究

ほとんどが実験的研究のため
研究計画は最後の、卒論、修論の試問会までのスケジュールから逆算して研究計画を立てる。
毎週1組の研究報告を開催し
チェックを入れた。
年2回の中間報告会で、その出来上がりを評価した。

１．研削加工時に発生する熱エネルギーのなかで対流熱輸送量を定量的に精確に見積もることを目的に簡便な発熱モデルを設置し速度、温度の分布を測定した。
２．流動層内に設置した鉛直平板における熱伝達係数への印加超音波により、伝熱面温度変化を測定しその特性を検討した。
３．対象にしている燃料電池の基本特性を知るために市販のモデルを購入し、その基本特性を
計測・解析する。
４．高付加価値エンプラのストランドを冷却する際の冷却槽を効率よく制御して新型のペレット製造システムの省エネ・省人型を図る目的に温度測定を行い
作成した制御プログラムが十分な働きをなすことを確認した。

１．研削加工時に発生する熱エネルギーのなかで対流熱輸送量を定量的に精確に見積もることを目的に簡便な発熱モデルを設置し速度、温度の分布を測定した。
２．加圧流動層内に設置した鉛直平板における熱伝達係数への加圧、粒子挙動、粒子経の影響を明らかにすることを目的に、伝熱面温度変化を測定しその特性を検討した。
３．対象にしている単一空間領域の熱環境をコントロールするために準定常モデルを提案しエネルギー評価とその熱環境制御
を行うことをおこない、モデルの有効性を示すとともに制御対象にPS－Indexの概念を持ち込んでその適用を試みた。
４．高付加価値エンプラのストランドを冷却する際の冷却槽を効率よく制御して新型のペレット製造システムの省エネ・省人型を図る目的に温度測定を行い
作成した制御プログラムが十分な働きをなすことを確認した。

１．循環流動層内濃度分布を計る。粒子速度分布あるいは熱伝達分布を知る。これらの相関から伝熱係数の整理式を提案する。現在粒子濃度の測定システム構築を図っている。
２．加圧流動層内に伝熱面を設置し、温度、粒子挙動等の定量化を行う。さらに伝熱係数の整理を試みる。現在伝熱面の形状と設置方法に関して検討中である。
３．研削熱の輸送経路で問題と成る対流空間内での速度分布、温度分布を測定している。その後エンタルピー計算をして伝熱総量に対する対流輸送熱量を精確に見積もる。
４．室内空間における流動が如何にその壁温度あるいは空間における温度(特に人間生活空間(ヒューマンゾーン)とのかかわりを持つかをテーマに２次元流動解析シュミレーションを行っている。
